scripts.cap:init: npx cap init 'LED CAD PRO' com.maher.ledcadpro --web-dir=dist
scripts.cap:add:android: npm run build && npx cap add android
scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.android:open: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap open android
scripts.android:apk: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:aab: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
